description: Clean SOW - should pass with high score
sow_text:
# Statement of Work

## Executive Summary
Acme Financial Services has engaged us to implement our Real-Time Payments solution.

## Scope of Work
We will deliver a fully functional real-time payment processing system.

## Deliverables
1. Payment processing engine
2. API integration layer
3. Admin dashboard
4. Documentation

## Timeline
Phase 1: Planning (2 weeks)
Phase 2: Development (8 weeks)
Phase 3: Testing (2 weeks)
Phase 4: Deployment (1 week)

## Service Level Agreement
- 99.9% uptime guarantee
- Response time < 200ms for 95% of transactions
- 24/7 support

## Pricing
Total project cost: $250,000
Monthly maintenance: $5,000

## Liability Limitations
Our liability is limited to the fees paid in the 12 months preceding the claim.

## Termination Clause
Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

## Acceptance Criteria
System must process 1000 transactions per second in production environment.

# Statement of Work

## Executive Summary
Acme Corp needs fraud detection.

## Scope of Work
Implement fraud detection platform.

## Deliverables
1. Fraud detection engine
2. Dashboard

## Timeline
4 weeks total

## Pricing
$50,000

# Statement of Work

## Executive Summary
Payment gateway implementation.

## Scope
Implement payment processing.

## Deliverables
1. Gateway

## Liability
Vendor accepts unlimited liability for all damages.

# Statement of Work

## Executive Summary
Real-time payments for banking client.

## Scope
Payment processing system.

## Deliverables
1. Processing engine
2. API

## Service Level Agreement
- 95% uptime
- Best effort support

## Liability Limitations
Limited to fees paid.

## Termination
30 days notice.
